nodes.text: JJ-EP9 was a GNK-series power droid that fought in a droid battle in Galma on the Outer Rim planet Batuu sometime during the First Order/Resistance War. The battle was broadcast over the local radio station BSO 401.72 and resulted in a controversial victory for the droid R-3PO.
JJ-EP9 was first introduced as part of a radio broadcast of a droid battle, included as part of a background audio loop in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge.
